BCL - Battle Creek Letters (1928)


Letters and Manuscripts

Relating to

Medical Missionary Work

and

Going to Battle Creek

May 28,1928




                                          Document File 194 

                                   Sanitarium, California 
                                        November 7, 1905. 


                   Instruction to be Repeated 


     During the night we were in a council meeting, trying to decide what we were going to do. One of authority stood up and said, "Everything that has been given to ministers, to men in responsible positions, to teachers, to managers, to the different conferences, is to be repeated and repeated, because Satan is now doing a special work to make of no effect the testimonies that come from God. We must work earnestly to bring this instruction before the people."
